name: Alühn
storyline:
Kai and Loreng are getting bored. Before they die from boredom, they decide to go to Ben's to play Mario Kart while enjoying hopscotch and malt. They promptly contact Ben, but then comes the shock: Ben has run out of beer!
What will the boys do when it's a Sunday and Loreng's banking card seems to have disappeared?
summary: Alühn is a classic 2D Point & Click adventure game which incorporates a verb GUI that resembles games like ZakMcKrackon or Monkey Island. The whole game is riddled with gags, crazy characters but also with a few tricky puzzles that need to be solved.
